CodecDevice::AudioEncoderParameters

CodecDevice::AudioEncoderParameters Struct Reference

#include <Apoxi/AddOns/CodecManager/CodecDevice.hpp>


Data Fields

INT m_bit_allocation_method
INT16 m_bit_pool
UINT32 m_block_len
INT m_channel_mode
UINT32 m_input_sampling_frequency
UINT32 m_num_of_subbands

Detailed Description

Audio encoder parameters passed to the encoder that is opened. Note: some of the parameters are not valid for all audio encoders, thus, they will be ignored by the corresponding encoders.
See also:
AudioDecoder::SetConfig

Field Documentation

INT CodecDevice::AudioEncoderParameters::m_bit_allocation_method
 

Bit allocation method. It has to be casted to AudioEncoder::BitAllocationMethodType enum.

INT16 CodecDevice::AudioEncoderParameters::m_bit_pool
 

Value of bitpool for frame (for SBC encoder it can vary between 8 and 255. Bitpool parameter is proportional to the bit-rate of operation.

UINT32 CodecDevice::AudioEncoderParameters::m_block_len
 

Block length for filter bank.

INT CodecDevice::AudioEncoderParameters::m_channel_mode
 

Channel mode. It has to be casted to AudioEncoder::ChannelModeType enum.

UINT32 CodecDevice::AudioEncoderParameters::m_input_sampling_frequency
 

Sampling frequency of the input PCM data in Hertz.

UINT32 CodecDevice::AudioEncoderParameters::m_num_of_subbands
 

Number of subbands in filter bank.
